Traits.Name: Sturdy
Traits.Description: Immune to shove, daze, and stun.

Traits.Name: Body of the Land
Traits.Description: When defeated, roll a d6. The Hob collapses into the natural land, disappearing. Every space of this Hob becomes a height 1 terrain piece (5-6), difficult terrain (2-4), or a pit (1).

Actions.Name: Mudslide
Actions.Description: The hob dashes 4 with phasing, then creates a terrain effect in the spaces it just passed through. Non-hob characters that enter the space for the first time on their turn or start their turn there must save or slip and be shoved 3 in a direction of the hob's choice.
